evidence_in_dialogue: ( He finally peers around the side of the counter and sees the briefcase sitting on the floor . )
( JAKE RICHARDS reaches for the briefcase . )
[[Brass]] you were let go by thriftright last year , and lost a court battle to get your job back
[[Nick]] she was going back to college , turning her life around getting out of the business , and you killed her for it !

case_summary: Bombings of Thrift-Right and Hansen buildings
